user.title: Select LLM Provider
user.description:
Choose your preferred LLM provider.

**Groq**: Ultra-fast inference with automatic caching (recommended)
**OpenRouter**: Access to all models (Claude, GPT-4, Llama, etc.)

api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: Enter your API key. You can get one at {docs_url}

reconfigure.title: Update API Keys

data_description.groq_api_key: Enter a new Groq API key or leave empty to keep the current one.
data_description.api_key: Enter a new OpenRouter API key or leave empty to keep the current one.

error.invalid_api_key: Invalid OpenRouter API key. Please check and try again.
error.invalid_groq_api_key: Invalid Groq API key. Please check and try again.
error.groq_api_key_required: Groq API key is required for Groq provider.
error.no_api_key: At least one API key (OpenRouter or Groq) is required.

init.title: Smart Assist Settings
init.description: Configure global settings for Smart Assist.

user.title: LLM Provider Selection
user.description:
Select the LLM provider for this conversation agent.

**OpenRouter**: Access to all models (Claude, GPT-4, Llama, etc.) via a unified API.
**Groq**: Direct connection for ultra-fast inference with automatic caching.

data_description.llm_provider: Select OpenRouter for model variety or Groq for fastest inference.
data_description.groq_api_key: Enter your Groq API key (get one at console.groq.com).

model.title: Model Selection
model.description: Select the AI model for this conversation agent.

data_description.model: Select a model or enter a custom model ID.

settings.title: Agent Settings
settings.description: Configure provider and behavior settings for this conversation agent.

data.enable_prompt_caching: Enable prompt caching (reduces latency and cost)
data.cache_ttl_extended: Extended cache TTL (1 hour for Anthropic)

data_description.provider: OpenRouter only: Select a specific provider or use 'Automatic' for best price routing.
data_description.temperature: Lower values produce more consistent outputs, higher values are more creative.
data_description.max_tokens: Maximum number of tokens in the response.
data_description.language: Leave empty for auto-detect (uses HA language). Or enter any language (e.g., 'French', 'es-ES', 'Japanese').
data_description.cache_ttl_extended: Enable 1-hour cache instead of 5 minutes. Only applies to Anthropic models.
data_description.enable_cache_warming: Keeps the prompt cache warm by sending periodic requests. Incurs small additional API costs.
data_description.cache_refresh_interval: How often to refresh the cache (in minutes). Set below the cache TTL.
data_description.clean_responses: Makes responses TTS-friendly by removing emojis, markdown formatting, and URLs.
data_description.ask_followup: If enabled, the assistant will offer further help after completing actions.
data_description.calendar_context: Automatically mention upcoming calendar events. Note: Increases token usage.

prompt.title: System Prompt
prompt.description: Customize the assistant's personality and behavior.

data_description.user_system_prompt: Personality and instructions for this conversation agent.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Agent - LLM Provider
reconfigure.description:
Select the LLM provider for this agent.

After confirming, you can update model and other settings.

reconfigure_model.title: Reconfigure Agent - Model
reconfigure_model.description: Select a new model for this agent.

reconfigure_settings.title: Reconfigure Agent - Settings
reconfigure_settings.description: Update provider and behavior settings for this conversation agent.

abort.no_api_keys_configured: No API keys configured. Please add at least one API key in the main integration settings.

error.groq_api_key_required: Groq API key is required for Groq provider.
error.openrouter_api_key_required: OpenRouter API key is required for OpenRouter provider.

user.title: LLM Provider Selection
user.description:
Select the LLM provider for this AI task.

**OpenRouter**: Access to all models via a unified API.
**Groq**: Direct connection for ultra-fast inference.

data_description.llm_provider: Select OpenRouter for model variety or Groq for fastest inference.
data_description.groq_api_key: Enter your Groq API key (get one at console.groq.com).

model.title: Model Selection
model.description: Select the AI model for this task.

data_description.model: Select a model or enter a custom model ID.

settings.title: Task Settings
settings.description: Configure provider and other settings for this AI task.

data_description.provider: OpenRouter only: Select a specific provider or use 'Automatic' for best price routing.
data_description.temperature: Lower values produce more consistent outputs, higher values are more creative.
data_description.max_tokens: Maximum number of tokens in the response.
data_description.language: Leave empty for auto-detect (uses HA language). Or enter any language (e.g., 'French', 'es-ES', 'Japanese').
data_description.task_system_prompt: Instructions for this AI task in automations.
data_description.task_enable_prompt_caching: Not recommended - background tasks are not time-critical.
data_description.task_enable_cache_warming: Not recommended - background tasks are not time-critical.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Task - LLM Provider
reconfigure.description:
Select the LLM provider for this task.

After confirming, you can update model and other settings.

reconfigure_model.title: Reconfigure Task - Model
reconfigure_model.description: Select a new model for this AI task.

reconfigure_settings.title: Reconfigure Task - Settings
reconfigure_settings.description: Update provider and behavior settings for this AI task.

abort.no_api_keys_configured: No API keys configured. Please add at least one API key in the main integration settings.

error.openrouter_api_key_required: OpenRouter API key is required for OpenRouter provider.
